directions: Halve eggs lenghtwise and transfer yolks to medium bowl. Mash yolks with fork. Mix in yogurt or (mayonaise) and mustard. Mix in 1/3 cup radishes, 4 teaspoons chives and thyme. Season filling to taste with salt and generous amout of pepper.
Spoon filling into egg whites, mounding center. Top with additional chives, thyme, and radishes. Arrange on platter. Garnish with whole radishes.
ingredients: 1/4 cup plain nonfat yogurt or low-fat mayonaise
Additional chopped fresh chives, thyme, and radishes
title: Deviled Eggs with Radishes, Chives and Thyme
